short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides YouTube suggestions so you don't get distracted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plug hides YouTube suggestions so you don't get distracted.
Useful for anyone that gets lost in "Suggested/Recommended video" hole.

You can switch to "Theater mode" in the YouTube player, to take up the now empty space on the right.
